long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MyToDo: Simplify Tasks, Boost Productivity
Created by zzzt: Carefully crafted for a premium experience. Visit our website: www.zzzt.gr.

Discover MyToDo, the ultimate solution for effortless task management and increased productivity. This free extension helps you streamline your daily tasks, receive browser notifications and alarms (*) , and stay organized without compromising your privacy. Enjoy an ad-free experience and maximize your productivity.

Key Features:
- Daily Task Management: Organize your tasks efficiently for maximum productivity.
- Browser Notifications: Stay informed with timely reminders and notifications.
- Browser Alarms: Set alarms to never miss important deadlines or events.
- Privacy-focused: Your personal data is not collected or shared.
- Add and Remove Tasks: Easily manage your tasks with simple actions.
- Free Experience: Enjoy a distraction-free environment.

Why Choose MyToDo?
- Simplify Your Life: Stay organized and on top of your commitments.
- Boost Productivity: Accomplish more with effective task management.
- Reliable Notifications: Never miss important tasks with timely alerts.
- User-friendly Interface: Intuitive and easy to use for a seamless experience.
- Privacy First: Your data is secure, no personal information is collected.

Download MyToDo today and revolutionize your task management.
For any questions or support, contact us at help.zzzt.gr@gmail.com. Experience the power of MyToDo and take control of your productivity journey.
* Please, don't forget to enable Chrome's native notifications, if they are not already enabled.
